thread.title: California wildfire death toll rises to 5
thread.title_full: California wildfire death toll rises to 5 | News24

author: news24.com
title: California wildfire death toll rises to 5
text:
Los Angeles - The death toll from the monster wildfires raging in northern California has risen to five with the discovery of two new victims, authorities said on Thursday.
Both were killed in the so-called Valley fire, one of two giant blazes that have destroyed more than 800 homes and displaced thousands in the drought-stricken state.
Police located their remains while searching the burn zone with sniffer dogs on Wednesday morning.
"Human remains were located in the Hidden Valley area and the Anderson Springs area," Steven Brooks, spokesperson for the sheriff of Lake County, said in a statement.
